title: How to check world's picks
body: In game there is the mission where u choose teams in world's that u think will win, where do u check how many u got right

replies.body: You can check how your picks are holding up on the same page where you picked them. [**Check out the website here**](http://pickem.na.lolesports.com/en-US#welcome) and then click on My Picks towards the top.
